snippet.title: H2H XMas Single Segment UV-Max in 1:46:17
snippet.description:
H2H XMas: https://www.doomworld.com/idgames/themes/xmas/h2h-xmas (idgames), https://www.dsdarchive.com/wads/h2h-xmas (DSDA).

Advanced HUD was used when recording this run for kill and secret counters.

This was my first real attempt (total # is 2 since the first time I launched the run I quit right at the start of map 1). As such, don't expect much. (: I'm surprised I survived first time, since some of the ep 2 maps are a bit dangerous, and there are some close calls here. In any case, I hope other fans of this wad will enjoy this run.

I think it's a pretty fun run, but it's already past Christmas, so I don't really feel up to trying again. :D I did spend a decent amount of time routing each map, and I think it did end up in a run where it looks like I mostly know what I'm doing, but there are some mixups and bits of confusion. It's too bad I missed the line skip on map 7, though; it doesn't help a ton, but it made the rest of the map more dangerous than it should have been, and I got close to death as a result and confused the route a bit by forgetting to press a switch. I added a bonus demo showing my strafe40 setup for the line skip executed properly; dunno if I or anyone else will ever improve this, but at least for IL speed and maxes, this should be useful.

Captured using PrBoom+ 2.5.1.5
